product_name: Not Your Mother'sCurl Talk Defining & Frizz Taming Hair Cream
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsNot Your Mother's Curl Talk Defining Cream defines curls, locks in moisture, tames frizz, and adds shine. Infused with Rice Curl Complex, this protein-rich cream hydrates and boosts curl retention. Safe for color-treated hair and all curl types, it's free of sulfates, silicones, and parabens.
details: DetailsBenefitsEnhances curl shape and bounce for clearly defined curlsLocks in hydration to keep curls soft and healthySmooths and enhances natural shine for vibrant curlsTames flyaways and helps curls stay sleek and polishedStrengthens and nourishes curls with Rice Curl ComplexLeaves curls feeling smooth, hydrated, and touchablePerfect for all curly and wavy hair types, including color-treated hairFeatures fresh notes of lemon, jasmine, rose water, sunflower, and sandalwoodScent TypeCitrus Jasmine ScentFormulated WithoutSulfate surfactantsSiliconesParabensDrying alcoholItem 2530113How To UseOn damp hair apply a small amount evenly from roots to ends, adding more asâ€¯needed. Air dry or style as desired. Safe for natural andâ€¯color-treated hair.IngredientsWater (Aqua) (Eau), Polyacrylamide, C13-14 Isoalkane, Shea Butter Ethyl Esters, Polyquaternium-10, Keratin Amino Acids, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Acyl Coenzyme A Desaturase, Lactobacillus/Tomato Fruit Ferment Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, PG-Hydroxyethylcellulose Cocodimonium Chloride, Laureth-7, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), Linalool, Limonene, Hydroxycitronellal, Citronellol.
how_to_use: On damp hair apply a small amount evenly from roots to ends, adding more asâ€¯needed. Air dry or style as desired. Safe for natural andâ€¯color-treated hair.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: I love the why it works on my curly hair it doesn't feel stiff and hard â€¦ you can run your fingers through your hair , love the smell ðŸ¥° very good choice have to get me a bigger bottle

reviews.headline: Best curly/wavy hair brand!
reviews.comments: I love this product! I have bought it like 10 times. It helps my wavys and makes my hair soft.

reviews.headline: I recommend this product!!
reviews.comments: I have 3A hair and I straighten my hair for like 3 years so I had very damaged hair and it wouldn't curl much but this product helped my curls hold more and as a beginner the price was definitely affordable so I'd recommend this!!

reviews.headline: I loved this product!
reviews.comments: This is a really good product. It defines my curls/waves very well and makes for an excellent base for the rest of my products. It isn't too heavy, and it sits very well.

reviews.headline: Not bad on its own
reviews.comments:
I love love love the gel and the leave in from the curl talk line so I had high hopes for this product. On its own its lovely as a curl cream, adds some definition and bounce. However, when I mixed it with the other two curl talk products my hair was very stringy and sticky. It was so terrible that I had to wash my hair the very next day. 

I do like to use this when I have to wear my hair up. I work as a barista so I will wash my hair and use just this so my curls look pretty when I put them into a messy bun. works great for that kind of purpose.

reviews.headline: nice
reviews.comments: i like it it hold the curls and u can use a little amount and i'll do the job

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: The not your mothers curl talk curl defining cream  can work for wavy hair! It's lightweight, so it shouldn't weigh your waves down, and it helps enhance natural texture while controlling frizz. For me it helped my waves get a good structure. Give it a try and see if it works for you!

reviews.headline: I love the way my curls look and feel!
reviews.comments: My curls love this product.

reviews.headline: I would not buy again makes my hair look frizzy and dry
reviews.comments: I would not recommend this product they have changed the formula and it makes my hair dry and friizzy

reviews.headline: Love this stuff!
reviews.comments: I have that wavy/curly hair that always looks a little unruly and turns into a giant poof ball if I brush it, but will be curly if treated with the right products and routine. It's also a bit on the finer side. Unfortunately, I'm a pretty lazy girl compounded by the fact that I have to be up at 3:30 in the morning for work so I'm not into a lengthy routine and I hate using tons of product in my hair. I picked this up at another store on a whim one day and I love it. If I apply it to my hair when it's wet (not dripping, just towel dry) and scrunch while blow drying, it definitely gives my hair more of a curly look. Does not leave a crunchy or oily feeling. I also noticed that it does help control the frizz decently (which is a tall order because I live in 100,000% humidity SWFL). I even use it when I want to straighten my hair to help the frizz. It has a beautiful scent, not super light but not overwhelming, and the scent lightens as my hair drys leaving only a hint if I stick my hose right into my hair. The scent is fresh, sorta cocoa buttery, not floral to my nose. I'm super sensitive to fragrance, especially florals, but this is just heavenly. I'm about to grab a couple of bottles because my son tried it in his ridiculously beautiful, thick, wavy hair and won't give it back! Bottom line, it works for both my bipolar, fine hair and my son's thick waves without greasy residue or making it stiff.

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: I really liked the way it made my curly hair look, my curls are soft and definitely more defined with this product. Not too much frizz but just a tiny bit. I use it with hair oil and hair gel to get the perfect curls.

reviews.headline: Will always re-purchase.!!!!
reviews.comments: I love this curl cream. I've been buying it for years.!!! It works well on my wavy/curly hair. my hair is right in the middle. It is not fine, but it is not course. It's a medium texture. I love that this curl cream does not weigh my hair down and that it has protein. I use the curl cream in combination with the instant freeze gel the stronghold version level five.

reviews.headline: Favorite curl cream!
reviews.comments: It is light weight for my curls, has protein in it, and does not over moisturize them!

reviews.headline: Better affordable options out there
reviews.comments: My biggest issue with Curl Talk collection as a whole would be the fragrance and how sticky it leaves your hair after. Not the biggest fan, but consistent results. Feel like there are so many other options that don't leave my hair sticky

reviews.headline: Repurchased and will again
reviews.comments: This is the best curl cream i have used. It creates a slight cast (btw thats a good thing) and it leaves my hair with no residue, definition, volume, keeps it soft, and has a touchable hold but doesn't weigh it down. So  RUN TO BUY THIS (if you have 2b-3c hair)

reviews.headline: Repurchased and will again
reviews.comments: This is the best curl cream i have used. It creates a slight cast (btw thats a good thing) and it leaves my hair with no residue, definition, volume, keeps it soft, and has a touchable hold but doesn't weigh it down. So  RUN TO BUY THIS (if you have 2b-3c hair)

reviews.headline: Great results
reviews.comments: I have thick wavy/curly hair.  I've been getting good wash day results with this product with the curl talk mousse. You do need a styler with hold along with this cream. I also used the new curl talk spray gel with this with good results.

reviews.headline: It's ok
reviews.comments:
Wavy 2b/c, fine texture, med/high density, low/med porosity

The cream smells good (same as the other products in this line). 
Textire is on the balmy/cream side. For fine wavy hair was too heavy, but defined well.

reviews.headline: I have already bought this product again.
reviews.comments: I love this. I have tried so many products for my curly hair, and this is my favorite. For the efficiency of this product, the price is really good and completely worth it. I use this on my wet hair mainly, but it also works on damp or dry hair. I would recommend this to anyone who has even slightly curl hair.

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: I Rated this a 4 simply because it did not work for my hair, but I believe it is a good product and it may work for somebody else. For my hair it was way too stiff.

faceoff_positive.comments: you just need this in your life! the consistency is so light weight. It's not tacky at all! it smells amazing! when my hair dries it gives it so much definition with the Curl Talk Gel! literally the best combo. of course apply as much as your hair needs but this is amazing!
faceoff_positive.headline: Love thisss

faceoff_negative.comments:
After washing my hair with shampoo and conditioner, I rewet my hair and put in a leave-in conditioner leaving my hair feeling soft and moisturized as it should, but as soon as I applied this product my hair instantly became dry and sucked the moisture out. (Before applying this product, my hair was heavily saturated with water, to the point some drops were coming out of the section.) I thought it was a bit weird but assumed it was because I recently dyed my hair, and sprayed some more water on my hair as well as conditioner, but it wasn't enough as my hair stayed feeling this way and my hair ending up airdrying dehydrated and it became frizzy as well. This product did nothing but dry my hair out.

I had already washed my hair once since dying my hair using a different styling product and I had great results, with my hair feeling moisturized and not dry at all. I've always used thick styling creams like Cantu's Coconut Curling Cream which has worked great for me, but I thought I'd try something more lightweight and after seeing curly hair YouTubers review and speak highly of the entire Curl Talk line, I decided to get this product. This is one of the worst results I've had and although I wish it worked for me because I love the packaging, I don't think I'll be using it again. For anyone wondering what the consistency is like, it looks and feels like Elmer's Glue.
faceoff_negative.headline: Instantly made hair dry
